summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting deeds to a portion of Block 5, Lindsley's Mineral Springs Plat; a portion of Block 1, Lusk heights; a portion of Section 21, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M. (also known as a portion of A.W. Leonard's Subdivision, unrecorded), for street purposes and laying off Meridian Avenue North and 28th Avenue Northeast.
